title: Spicy Short Rib Peanut Ramen
ingredients: ['beef short ribs, bone-in or out, fat trimmed', 'low sodium beef or chicken broth', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'chili paste, to taste', 'creamy peanut butter', 'shallots, sliced', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh chopped ginger', 'bay leaves', 'cinnamon stick', 'baby spinach', 'dry ramen noodles', 'kimichi, cilantro, and green onion, for serving', 'chili oil, nori sheets, and sesame seeds, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'beef short ribs, bone-in or out, fat trimmed': '3-5', 'low sodium beef or chicken broth': '8', 'full-fat coconut milk': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'chili paste, to taste': '2-4', 'creamy peanut butter': '1/4', 'shallots, sliced': '6', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'fresh chopped ginger': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'cinnamon stick': '1', 'baby spinach': '3', 'dry ramen noodles': '4-6', 'kimichi, cilantro, and green onion, for serving': 'seasoning', 'chili oil, nori sheets, and sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of the crockpot, season the short ribs with pepper. Pour over the broth, coconut milk, and tamari. Add the chili paste, peanut butter, shallots, garlic, ginger, bay leaves, and cinnamon stick. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 4-6 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the short ribs from the crockpot and place onto a baking sheet. Break into a few chunks and discard any bones. Broil until caramelized on top, about 3-5 minutes, but watch closely.', '3. Meanwhile, crank the heat on the slow cooker to high. Stir in the spinach and noodles and let cook, uncovered, for about 5 minutes. Stir in the short ribs.', '4. Ladle the broth, short ribs, spinach, and noodles into bowls. Top as desired with kimchi, cilantro, green onions, chili oil, and sesame seeds. Serve immediately.']

title: French Onion Short Ribs
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'black pepper', 'shallots, sliced', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'chili flakes', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'bone-in beef short ribs', 'bay leaves', 'star anise', 'baby carrots', 'french bread', 'shredded Gruyère cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '6', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '4', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shallots, sliced': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'low sodium chicken broth': '6-8', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/2', 'bone-in beef short ribs': '4', 'bay leaves': '2', 'star anise': '1', 'baby carrots': '2', 'french bread': '6', 'shredded Gruyère cheese': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 325° F.', '2. In a large oven-safe Dutch Oven over high heat, melt together the butter and onions. Cook 5 minutes, until softened. Add the wine, season with pepper, and continue cooking another 5-8 minutes, until the wine has evaporated and the onions are lightly golden. Add the shallots, garlic, thyme, sage, and chili flakes. Then add the short ribs. Pour over 6 cups of broth. Add the tamari, bay leaf, and star anise (if using). Cover and roast in the oven for 2 1/2 to 3 hours or until the short ribs are tender and falling off the bone. Add the carrots during the last 1-2 hours of cooking.', '3. Remove the bay leaves and star anise. Discard any bones and extra fatty pieces. Lightly shred the meat. Taste and season with salt, if needed. Place over LOW heat on the stove.', '4. Switch the oven to 425°. Arrange the bread on a baking sheet and toast for 10 minutes, until very dry. Switch the oven to broil. Top the toast with cheese, then broil until bubbly, 2 to 3 minutes.', '5. Ladle the soup into bowls. Top with cheesy toast, black pepper, and fresh thyme. Eat!']

title: Saucy Braised Garlic Butter Meatballs with Orzo
ingredients: ['ground chicken, pork, or beef', 'spicy Italian chicken sausage', 'Italian seasoning', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'poblano pepper, chopped', 'egg', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'garlic', 'marinara sauce', 'diced tomatoes', 'fresh basil leaves', 'salted butter', 'fresh sage or rosemary', 'orzo pasta, cooked']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken, pork, or beef': '1 1/2', 'spicy Italian chicken sausage': '3/4', 'Italian seasoning': '1-2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'poblano pepper, chopped': '1', 'egg': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic': '4-6', 'marinara sauce': '6', 'diced tomatoes': '1', 'fresh basil leaves': '1/2', 'salted butter': '8', 'fresh sage or rosemary': '6', 'orzo pasta, cooked': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Add the chicken, sausage, Italian seasoning, parmesan, poblano pepper, and egg to a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Mix to combine. Coat your hands with oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (around 22 meatballs).', '2. Heat a large braiser with sides over medium-high heat. Add olive oil, then add the meatballs and lightly sear, about 5 minutes. Add 2 tablespoons butter. Let the butter brown around the meatballs, another 2 minutes.', '3. Reduce the heat to medium. Pour in the marinara sauce, tomatoes, and add 3/4 cup water. Season with salt and pepper. Add the garlic and basil. Reduce the heat to low. Partially cover and simmer 20 minutes, until cooked through, or up to 3-4 hours, stirring every hour.', '4. Remove the garlic cloves from the meatballs. Add both the butter, sage, and garlic to a skillet set over medium heat. Mash the garlic into the butter, allowing the butter to brown and some of the garlic to get crispy.', '5. Before serving, cook the orzo. Toss the orzo in the garlic butter.', '6. Serve the meatballs and sauce over the orzo. Top with parmesan and basil.']

title: Crockpot Sun-Dried Tomato Chicken with Creamy Polenta
ingredients: ['oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breast', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'Italian seasoning', 'paprika or smoked paprika', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'dijon mustard', 'grainy dijon mustard', 'dry white wine', 'lemon juice', 'heavy cream', 'grated parmesan cheese + the rind', 'fresh baby spinach']
ingredients with measurement: {'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breast': '2', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'Italian seasoning': '1', 'paprika or smoked paprika': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'grainy dijon mustard': '1', 'dry white wine': '1/2', 'lemon juice': '2', 'heavy cream': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese + the rind': '3/4', 'fresh baby spinach': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Drain 2 tablespoons of oil from the sun-dried tomato jar into the crockpot. Chop the sun-dried tomatoes and set aside.', '2. In the crockpot, rub the chicken with the shallot, garlic, Italian seasoning, and the mustards. Season with salt, pepper, and chili flakes. Add the sun-dried tomatoes. Pour over the wine. Add the lemon juice and parmesan rind (if using). Cover and cook on low for 2-4 hours or on high for 1-2 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the chicken from the slow cooker and place on a baking sheet.', '3. Crank the heat on the slow cooker to high. Stir in the cream, spinach, and parmesan.', '4. Rub the chicken with the reserved oil, then broil 2-5 minutes, until crisp. Serve the chicken and sauce over creamy polenta, rice, or with crusty bread.']

title: Creamy Gnocchi Chicken Soup
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'celery stalks, chopped', 'salted butter', 'all-purpose flour', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs', 'garlic, chopped', 'Italian seasoning (see note)', 'paprika or smoked paprika', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'low sodium vegetable broth', 'chopped sun-dried tomatoes', 'baby spinach', 'canned coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk', 'grated parmesan', 'fresh potato gnocchi']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'carrots, chopped': '6', 'celery stalks, chopped': '4', 'salted butter': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '2', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs': '3/4', 'garlic, chopped': '2-4', 'Italian seasoning (see note)': '1', 'paprika or smoked paprika': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chili flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': '1', 'low sodium vegetable broth': '4-6', 'chopped sun-dried tomatoes': '1/2', 'baby spinach': '4-6', 'canned coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk': '1 1/2', 'grated parmesan': '1/2', 'fresh potato gnocchi': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a large soup pot set over medium heat, combine the olive oil and onion. Cook 5 minutes, until fragrant. Add the carrots and celery. Cook another 3 minutes.', '2. Stir in the butter and flour, cook 1 minute. Add the chicken, garlic, Italian seasoning, paprika, thyme, and a pinch each of chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Toss to coat in spices. Add 4 cups broth. Simmer over medium heat for 20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through.', '3. Pull the chicken out and shred using 2 forks. Add back to the soup.', '4. Stir in the spinach, sun-dried tomatoes, cream/milk, parmesan, and gnocchi. Cook until warmed throughout, about 5 minutes. If the soup is too thick, add additional broth.', '5. Serve the soup topped with parmesan. Enjoy warm, preferably with a crusty piece of bread.']

title: Easy Spicy Baked Potato Soup
ingredients: ['thick cut bacon, chopped', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'all-purpose or gluten free flour', 'low sodium vegetable broth', 'Russet potatoes, peeled and chopped', 'milk', 'salsa verde', 'plain greek yogurt or sour cream', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'chopped green onion, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick cut bacon, chopped': '6', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'all-purpose or gluten free flour': '1/4', 'low sodium vegetable broth': '4', 'Russet potatoes, peeled and chopped': '4', 'milk': '2', 'salsa verde': '1/3', 'plain greek yogurt or sour cream': '1/3', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'chopped green onion, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ["1. Cook the bacon in a large dutch oven over medium heat until crisp, about 5 minutes. Remove from the pot and reserve. If there's excess bacon grease, drain off all but 1 tablespoon.", '2. To the same pot, add the onion and cook 5 minutes, until fragrant. Add the garlic. Stir in the butter and flour, cook 1 minute. Pour over broth and stir in the potatoes. Partially cover and simmer over medium heat for 15-20 minutes, until the potatoes are very soft. Use a potato masher or fork to mash the potatoes. I like to leave my soup chunky and do 1/3 of the potatoes.', '3. Stir in the milk, salsa verde, yogurt/sour cream, and cheddar cheese. Cook 5-10 minutes, until the cheese is melted. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro. If needed, thin with additional broth.', '4. Ladle the soup into bowls. Top, as desired, with yogurt/sour cream, cheese, cilantro, and green onions. Adds lots of bacon. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Sticky Ginger Soy Chicken and Broccoli
ingredients: ['chicken breasts or thighs, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'broccoli florets', 'honey', 'ketchup', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'pomegranate juice', 'garlic, chopped', 'chopped fresh ginger', 'chili flakes', 'jasmine rice, for serving', 'sliced green onions and pomegranate']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken breasts or thighs, cut into 2 inch cubes': '2', 'broccoli florets': '3', 'honey': '1/2', 'ketchup': '1/2', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'pomegranate juice': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'chopped fresh ginger': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'jasmine rice, for serving': 'seasoning', 'sliced green onions and pomegranate': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Rub a baking sheet with oil.', '2. Arrange the chicken and broccoli in the prepared baking dish.', '3. In a bowl, whisk together the honey, ketchup, tamari, pomegranate juice, garlic, ginger, and a good pinch of chili flakes. Pour the sauce over the chicken and toss to coat. Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbling.', '5. Turn the oven to broil and broil 3-5 minutes, until the chicken caramelizes on top. WATCH CLOSELY, the broiler works fast. Serve the chicken, broccoli, and sauce over bowls of rice topped with green onions and pomegranate, if desired.']

title: Cozy Wild Rice and Orzo Chicken Soup
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, peeled', 'dry wild rice blend', 'carrots, chopped', 'chopped celery', 'poultry seasoning', 'paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'low-sodium chicken broth', 'fresh baby spinach or kale', 'dry orzo pasta', 'chopped fresh parsley', 'heavy cream or whole milk', 'salted butter', 'fresh sage leaves', 'shaved parmesan, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs': '3/4', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, peeled': '4', 'dry wild rice blend': '1', 'carrots, chopped': '1 1/2', 'chopped celery': '1', 'poultry seasoning': '1', 'paprika': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low-sodium chicken broth': '6', 'fresh baby spinach or kale': '2', 'dry orzo pasta': '3/4', 'chopped fresh parsley': '1/4', 'heavy cream or whole milk': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'fresh sage leaves': '8', 'shaved parmesan, for serving': 'seasoning'}

Mash the garlic into the butter, allowing the butter to brown and some of the garlic to get crispy. Remove from the heat.', '4. Ladle the soup into bowls and spoon over the sage butter. Top with parmesan and parsley. Enjoy!']

title: Crockpot Creamy Coconut Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garam masala', 'ground turmeric', 'kosher salt', 'full-fat plain Greek yogurt', 'tomato paste', 'full-fat unsweetened coconut milk', 'cilantro, chopped', 'salted butter', 'sesame seeds', 'chili flakes', 'paprika']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'garam masala': '2', 'ground turmeric': '1 1/2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'full-fat plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'tomato paste': '1', 'full-fat unsweetened coconut milk': '1', 'cilantro, chopped': '1/3', 'salted butter': '6', 'sesame seeds': '2', 'chili flakes': '1-2', 'paprika': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the chicken, yogurt, onion, shallot, garlic, ginger, garam masala, turmeric, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, and a pinch of chili flakes. Let sit 10 minutes. Add the tomato paste and 1/3 cup water. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours or on high for 3-4 hours.', '2. Crank the heat to high. Stir in the coconut milk and cook, uncovered, 10 minutes until warmed. Stir in the cilantro.', '3. Meanwhile, melt together the butter, sesame seeds, chili flakes, and paprika. Cook until the butter is browning. Remove from the heat.', '4. Serve the chicken and sauce over bowls of rice with fresh naan. Enjoy!']

title: Pull Apart Roasted Garlic Spinach and Artichoke Dip Sliders
ingredients: ['garlic', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'dinner rolls, halved lengthwise', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'sour cream', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed, and squeezed dry of excess water', 'marinated artichokes, chopped', 'shredded fontina or mozzarella cheese', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chili flakes', 'pickled jalapeños', 'salted butter, at room temp or melted', 'dried oregano', 'dried parsley']
ingredients with measurement: {'garlic': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': 'seasoning', 'dinner rolls, halved lengthwise': '1', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '6', 'sour cream': '1/4', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed, and squeezed dry of excess water': '10', 'marinated artichokes, chopped': '1', 'shredded fontina or mozzarella cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese': '1/3', 'onion powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'pickled jalapeños': 'seasoning', 'salted butter, at room temp or melted': '3', 'dried oregano': '1', 'dried parsley': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. Slice off the top portion of the garlic head to expose some of the cloves. Place the garlic on a piece of foil. Drizzle with olive oil, wrap it up, and bake for 40-55 minutes, until deeply golden and very soft.', '3. Meanwhile, in a bowl mix together the cream cheese, sour cream, spinach, artichokes, half of the mozzarella, half of the parmesan, and the onion powder. Season with salt, pepper, and chili flakes (to taste).', '4. Place the bottom half of the dinner rolls\xa0onto a baking sheet lined with parchment. Top with spinach dip, then the remaining mozzarella. Arrange the jalapeños on top. Place the top half of the roll over the cheese.', '5. Let the garlic cool, then squeeze the cloves out into a bowl. Add the butter, remaining parmesan, oregano, parsley, and chili flakes (to taste). Mash the cloves into the butter with a fork. Spread the butter over the top of the rolls. Cover the rolls and bake 10 minutes. Remove the foil and continue baking another 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '6. Brush with any remaining garlic butter, serve immediately.']

title: Easiest No-Boil Brie Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['dry shells or elbow macaroni', 'shredded Havarti cheese', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'whole milk', 'sour cream', 'ground mustard', 'cayenne', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'brie, rind removed, and cubed', 'crushed Ritz Crackers', 'salted butter, at room temperature', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'paprika']
ingredients with measurement: {'dry shells or elbow macaroni': '1', 'shredded Havarti cheese': '1 1/4', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1 1/4', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'whole milk': '3', 'sour cream': '1/2', 'ground mustard': '1/4', 'cayenne': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'brie, rind removed, and cubed': '6', 'crushed Ritz Crackers': '1 1/2', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'paprika': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375° F. Butter a 9×13-inch baking dish.', '2. To the baking dish, add the dry pasta, half of each shredded cheese, the milk, sour cream, ground mustard, cayenne, and 1/3 cup water. Season with salt and pepper. Stir to combine. Push the cubes of brie into the pasta. Tightly cover the baking dish with the foil. Bake for 25 minutes.', '3. Meanwhile, in a bowl, mix the Ritz with the butter, onion powder, garlic powder, and paprika.', '4. Uncover the pasta and sprinkle over the remaining shredded cheese. Top evenly with the Ritz. Bake another 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly. Remove from the oven. Dig in and enjoy!']

title: Creamy Tortellini French Onion Soup
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'garlic, chopped', 'sliced cremini or wild mushrooms', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'kosher salt', 'black pepper', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'parmesan cheese rind', 'heavy cream or whole milk', 'fresh cheese tortellini', 'french bread', 'shredded Gruyère cheese', 'chopped rosemary or thyme']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '6', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '4', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'sliced cremini or wild mushrooms': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'black pepper': '1', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '6-8', 'parmesan cheese rind': '1', 'heavy cream or whole milk': '1/2', 'fresh cheese tortellini': '1', 'french bread': '6', 'shredded Gruyère cheese': '2', 'chopped rosemary or thyme': '1'}
instructions: ["1. Melt together the butter and onions in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring occasionally until softened, about 10 minutes. Add the wine, 1/4 cup at a time, until the wine cooks into the onions. Continue to cook another 10-15 minutes until you've used all of the wine and the onions are deeply caramelized.", '2. Add the garlic, mushrooms, thyme, and sage. Season with salt and pepper, cook another 3-4 minutes. Add the broth, parmesan rind, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Increase the heat to medium-high and return the soup to a simmer, simmer 10 minutes, then stir in the cream and tortellini. Cook another 3-5 minutes. Remove the parmesan rind and discard. Season to taste with salt and pepper.', '3. Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 400° F. Arrange the bread on a baking sheet and toast for 10-15 minutes, until very dry. Switch the oven to broil.', '4. Ladle the soup into oven safe bowls. Add a slice of bread to each, and top evenly with cheese. Add rosemary, or thyme if desired. Place each soup bowl on a baking sheet and transfer to the oven, broil until bubbly and golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Eat!']

title: One Pot Stove-Top Pumpkin Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'garlic, smashed', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh sage', 'short-cut pasta', 'canned coconut milk or whole milk', 'cream cheese, cubed', 'pumpkin puree', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded creamy gouda cheese', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'nutmeg', 'Kosher salt and black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '2', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'fresh sage': '9', 'short-cut pasta': '1', 'canned coconut milk or whole milk': '1', 'cream cheese, cubed': '3', 'pumpkin puree': '1', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded creamy gouda cheese': '1 1/2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'nutmeg': '1/4', 'Kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Melt the butter with the garlic, thyme, and sage in a large pot set over medium heat. Allow the butter to brown around the garlic, 3-5 minutes. Once browned, remove the sage leaves and set aside.', '2. To the pot, add the pasta and toss with the butter. Add 4 cups of water and bring to a boil over high heat. Add 1 1/2 teaspoons salt. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes. Do not drain the water. Stir in the milk, cream cheese, and pumpkin, and cook until the cream cheese has melted and the pasta is al dente, about 4-5 minutes more.', '4. Pick out the garlic cloves and set aside. Add the cheddar and Gouda, onion powder, paprika, cayenne, and nutmeg, and stir until melted and creamy. Remove from the heat.', '5. If desired, chop or mash the garlic and stir in the pasta. Season with salt and pepper. If the sauce feels thick, add ¼ cup milk or water to thin.', '6. Divide the mac and cheese between bowls. Top with black pepper, the reserved sage, and grated nutmeg.']

title: Roasted Garlic Alla Vodka Stuffed Spaghetti Squash
ingredients: ['medium spaghetti squash, halved and seeds removed', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'Italian seasoning', 'kosher salt', 'black pepper', 'garlic', 'shallot, finely chopped', 'chopped fresh sage', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'tomato paste', 'vodka', 'basil pesto', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk', 'salted butter', 'grated Parmesan cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'shredded mozzarella, or creamy gouda', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium spaghetti squash, halved and seeds removed': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'Italian seasoning': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic': '1', 'shallot, finely chopped': '1', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1-2', 'tomato paste': '1/2', 'vodka': '1/4', 'basil pesto': '1/2', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'grated Parmesan cheese': '1/3', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1', 'shredded mozzarella, or creamy gouda': '1/2', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. Place the squash in a baking dish and rub with 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Sprinkle with Italian seasoning. Season with salt and pepper.', '3. Slice off the top portion of the garlic head to expose some of the cloves. Place the garlic in a piece of foil. Drizzle with olive oil and wrap it up and place on the pan with the squash. Bake 15 minutes.', '4. Meanwhile, make the sauce. Heat 3 tablespoons olive oil in skillet over medium-low heat. Add the shallot and sage. Cook until the shallots begin to caramelize, about 5 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the tomato paste and red pepper flakes, cook 4-5 minutes, until thickened. Stir in the vodka, cook another 2 minutes. Stir in 1/2 cup water, the pesto, and the cream. Season with salt and pepper. Add the parmesan and basil.', '5. Remove the squash from the oven and sprinkle each with mozzarella cheese. Divide the sauce between the squash. Top with the fontina and provolone cheese. Bake the squash and garlic another 15-20 minutes or until the squash is tender and the cheese is golden brown on top.', '6. Let the garlic cool, then squeeze the cloves out into a bowl. Add the butter and 1 tablespoon of sage. Mash the cloves into the butter with a fork. Spread the butter over the squash, then use a fork to scrape the squash into strands, mixing the cheese with the squash. Enjoy!']

title: Super Easy Homemade Cheesy Spaghetti O’s
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, chopped', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'chili flakes', 'tomato paste', 'Anellini or other small pasta', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'onion powder', 'paprika', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'grated pecorino cheese', 'fresh basil']

instructions: ['1. Melt together the butter, olive oil, garlic, oregano, and chili flakes in a large pot over medium heat. Cook until the butter turns golden, about 5 minutes.', '2. title: 20 Minute Korean Beef Sesame Noodles
ingredients: ['garlic chopped', 'chopped fresh ginger', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'honey', 'rice vinegar', 'Gochujang', 'toasted sesame oil', 'brown rice noodles', 'sesame oil', 'mixed stir fry vegetables', 'shallots, sliced', 'flank steak or chicken breast, sliced thin', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'garlic chopped': '4', 'chopped fresh ginger': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/2', 'honey': '1/4', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'Gochujang': '2-3', 'toasted sesame oil': '1', 'brown rice noodles': '8', 'sesame oil': '2', 'mixed stir fry vegetables': '3', 'shallots, sliced': '3', 'flank steak or chicken breast, sliced thin': '1', 'toasted sesame seeds': '1/4', 'fresh basil': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the sauce. Combe all ingredients in a glass jar. Shake or whisk to combine.', '2. Cook the rice noodles according to package directions.\xa0Drain and rinse under cold water.', '3. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over high heat. title: Spicy Zucchini and Pesto Cheese Stuffed Shells
ingredients: ['ground spicy Italian chicken sausage', 'zucchini, chopped', 'tomato paste', 'vodka', 'milk', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh oregano, chopped', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'jumbo shells', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'basil pesto', 'mozzarella, torn', 'fresh basil for, serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground spicy Italian chicken sausage': '3/4', 'zucchini, chopped': '3', 'tomato paste': '1/3', 'vodka': '1/3', 'milk': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh oregano, chopped': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'jumbo shells': '1', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '2', 'shredded provolone cheese': '2', 'basil pesto': '3/4', 'mozzarella, torn': '4', 'fresh basil for, serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Lightly grease a baking dish or use an oven-safe skillet and skip the dish.', '2. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat and boil the pasta until al dente according to package directions. Reserve 1 cup of pasta cooking water, then drain.', '2. Meanwhile, cook the chicken sausage and zucchini in a large skillet over medium heat until browned all over, about 5 to 8 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the tomato paste, thyme, and oregano. Cook 1-2 minutes, then add the vodka. Simmer 1 minute, pour in the milk plus 1/3 cup pasta cooking water. season with salt and pepper. Simmer for 10 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly, but is still saucy. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed.', '4. In a medium bowl, combine the ricotta, provolone, and 1/2 cup pesto.', '5. To assemble, spoon 3/4 of the sauce into the bottom of the prepared baking dish. Working with one pasta shell at a time, spoon about 1 tablespoon of the cheese mixture into each shell, placing the filled shell into the baking dish as you go. Spoon the remaining sauce over the shells, then drizzle the remaining pesto. Add the mozzarella.', '6. Bake 15-20 minutes or until the cheese has melted. Serve with fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: Creamy Garlic Corn Chicken with Cheesy Polenta
ingredients: ['milk', 'dry polenta', 'gouda cheese, or grated parmesan', 'salted butter', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed', 'cornstarch', 'cajun seasoning', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'raw corn kernels', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk', 'lemon zest', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'milk': '2', 'dry polenta': '1', 'gouda cheese, or grated parmesan': '1/2', 'salted butter': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed': '1 1/2', 'cornstarch': '1', 'cajun seasoning': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'raw corn kernels': '2', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk': '1/2', 'lemon zest': '2', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the polenta. In a medium pot, add 2 cups water and the milk. Bring to a low boil, then whisk in the polenta, stirring until the polenta is soft and thick, about 3-5 minutes. Stir in the parmesan, butter, and season with salt and pepper. Turn the heat off, cover the pot, and let the polenta sit 5 minutes.', '2. Meanwhile, make the chicken. Toss the chicken with the cornstarch.', '3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the butter, chicken, 1 tablespoon cajun seasoning, and a big pinch of pepper. Cook 5-minutes, until browned.\xa0Stir in the corn, garlic, and thyme and continue to cook until the garlic is fragrant.', '4. Pour in the cream and stir in 2 teaspoons cajun seasoning. Cook 1-2 minutes to warm through, adding water or additional cream to thin the sauce. Remove from the heat, stir in the lemon zest and basil.', '5. title: Chili Crisp Peanut Noodles with Crispy Halloumi
ingredients: ['rice noodles or long cut pasta', 'creamy peanut butter', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'honey', 'Thai red curry paste', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'carrots, shredded', 'bell peppers, thinly sliced', 'sesame oil', 'halloumi cheese, cubed and patted dry', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'green onions, thinly sliced', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'chopped peanuts', 'lime juice']

title: One Skillet Street Corn Chicken Enchilada Bake

title: Heirloom Tomato Cheddar Tart with Everything Spice.

title: 20 Minute Thai Basil Beef and Lemongrass Rice Bowls.
ingredients: ['shredded carrots', 'bell pepper, sliced', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'green onions, chopped', 'toasted sesame oil', 'lime juice', 'rice vinegar', 'fish sauce or tamari', 'honey', 'lean ground beef', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh grated ginger', 'black pepper', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'Thai or sweet Italian basil, chopped', 'sesame seeds and peanuts, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'shredded carrots': '1', 'bell pepper, sliced': '1', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '1/2', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'toasted sesame oil': '2', 'lime juice': '2', 'rice vinegar': '1', 'fish sauce or tamari': '1', 'honey': '2', 'lean ground beef': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '1/3', 'Thai or sweet Italian basil, chopped': '2', 'sesame seeds and peanuts, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the salad. Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Toss well and set aside.', '2. To make the beef. In a large skillet, cook the beef with black pepper over medium heat, breaking up the meat as it cooks until browned, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and ginger and cook another minute. Add the tamari, sweet Thai chili sauce, and 1 cup of fresh basil. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook until the sauce coats the beef, 3-5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the remaining basil.', '3. Divide the rice and beef between bowls. Add the salad to the bowl. Top with peanuts, sesame seeds, and fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: Fajita Chicken and Avocado Ranch Salad Wraps
ingredients: ['avocado, pitted and peeled', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'pickled jalapeños', 'lemon juice', 'chopped fresh chives', 'chopped fresh dill', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'large tortillas', 'gluten free tortillas (optional)', 'shredded lettuce', 'cooked quinoa', 'fajita seasoning', 'shredded cheddar or pepper jack', 'cooked black beans', 'grilled or roasted corn', 'roasted/grilled bell pepper, sliced', 'grilled chicken, cubed or shredded', 'fresh cilantro, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'avocado, pitted and peeled': '1', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt': '1/2', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/4', 'lemon juice': '2', 'chopped fresh chives': '3', 'chopped fresh dill': '2', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'large tortillas': '4', 'gluten free tortillas (optional)': 'seasoning', 'shredded lettuce': '3', 'cooked quinoa': '1', 'fajita seasoning': '1-2', 'shredded cheddar or pepper jack': '1/2', 'cooked black beans': '1', 'grilled or roasted corn': '1', 'roasted/grilled bell pepper, sliced': '1', 'grilled chicken, cubed or shredded': '1-1 1/2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a food processor or blender with 1/3 cup water. Blend until creamy, adding more water as needed to thin. Taste and adjust the salt and pepper.', '2. To make the wraps. In a large salad bowl, combine the lettuce, quinoa, fajita seasoning, cheese, black beans, peppers, corn, and cilantro. Toss with 1/2 of the dressing.', "3. Place one tortilla at a time in the microwave for 20 seconds. Spread on a layer of ranch then add the salad and chicken. Drizzle over more ranch and if you're feeling it, more fajita seasoning. Fold the tortilla over the ingredients. Fold sides and ends of tortillas over filling and roll forward. Repeat with remaining ingredients.", '4. Serve room temp or place in a skillet with olive oil to warm. Enjoy with extra dressing!']

title: Sweet and Spicy Sesame Meatball Bowl with Mango Cucumber Salad
ingredients: ['ground chicken or pork', 'green onions chopped', 'garlic, grated', 'grated ginger', 'cilantro, chopped', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'black pepper', 'sesame oil', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'chili sauce', 'honey', 'sesame seeds', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder', 'steamed rice', 'Persian cucumbers, sliced', 'mango, peach, or a mix, chopped', 'Gochugaru flakes', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'sesame seeds']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken or pork': '1', 'green onions chopped': '2', 'garlic, grated': '3', 'grated ginger': '2', 'cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'Worcestershire sauce': '1', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'sesame oil': '2', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1', 'chili sauce': '1-2', 'honey': '2', 'sesame seeds': '1', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder': '1', 'steamed rice': '3', 'Persian cucumbers, sliced': '2', 'mango, peach, or a mix, chopped': '1', 'Gochugaru flakes': '1'}
instructions: ['1. To make the meatballs. Add the chicken, green onions, 1 clove grated garlic, 1 tablespoon grated ginger, cilantro, Worcestershire sauce, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Mix until just combined. Coat your hands with a bit of oil and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-20 meatballs).', '2. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the meatballs and sear until crisp and mostly cooked through, about 5-8 minutes, turning them 2-3 times.', '3. Meanwhile, make the sauce. In a glass jar, combine the tamari, 1/3 cup water, 3 cloves grated garlic, 1 tablespoon grated ginger, chili sauce, honey, and sesame seeds. In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch with 1 tablespoon water.', '4. Pour the sauce over the meatballs. Simmer 2-3 minutes, then add the cornstarch, and cook until the sauce lightly coats the meatballs.', '5. Add the cucumbers to a bowl and toss with 1 tablespoon of salt. Let sit 5 minutes, then drain out the water. Add the mango, gochugaru flakes, tamari, and sesame seeds.', '6. Spoon the rice into bowls. Add the salad, the meatballs, and a handful of green onions and basil.']

title: Easiest One Pan Corn and Zucchini Pesto Orzo Casserole
ingredients: ['zucchini or yellow summer squash, sliced', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, chopped', 'shallot, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'Italian seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'fresh corn', 'chili flakes', 'dry orzo pasta', 'basil pesto', 'shredded Havarti or mozzarella cheese', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'zucchini or yellow summer squash, sliced': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'Italian seasoning': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh corn': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'dry orzo pasta': '1', 'basil pesto': '1', 'shredded Havarti or mozzarella cheese': '3/4', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '3/4', 'fresh basil': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. In a 9×13 inch baking dish, combine the zucchini, olive oil, garlic, shallots, thyme, Italian seasoning, chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Roast 15 minutes. Pull the zucchini out of the oven. To the same pan, add the corn, orzo, and pesto. Pour over 2 1/2 cups of water and stir to combine. Return the dish to the oven and bake for 12-15 minutes, until most of the water has cooked into the pasta, but not all of it.', "3. Stir the pasta around, then sprinkle over the cheeses. Bake another 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted and the sauce is bubbling. If there's a lot of oil from the pesto on top, drain off the excess. Top with fresh basil!"]

title: One Pot Creamy Roasted Red Pepper Chicken Pasta
ingredients: ['roasted red peppers', 'toasted walnuts', 'cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, smashed', 'fresh parsley', 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'fruity champagne or wine vinegar', 'honey', 'smoked paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'boneless chicken, cubed', 'Italian seasoning', 'red pepper flakes', 'grated manchego cheese', 'short cut pasta', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'arugula']
ingredients with measurement: {'roasted red peppers': '1', 'toasted walnuts': '1/2', 'cherry tomatoes': '1/2', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'fresh parsley': '2', 'extra-virgin olive oil': '1/2', 'fruity champagne or wine vinegar': '2', 'honey': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2-1', 'boneless chicken, cubed': '1', 'Italian seasoning': '3', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'grated manchego cheese': '1', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1', 'arugula': '1'}
instructions: ['1. To make the red pepper sauce. In a blender or food processor, combine the red peppers, walnuts, tomatoes, garlic, parsley, olive oil, vinegar, honey, 1 teaspoon paprika, cayenne, and a generous pinch of salt. Blend until smooth, about 1 minute.', '2. Set a large pot or skillet with sides over medium-high heat. Add the chicken, Italian seasoning, 1 teaspoon paprika, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook until golden brown, 5 minutes. Add 1/4 cup manchego, cook another minute, then remove the chicken from the pot.', '3. To the same pot, pour in 3 1/2 cups water. Bring to a boil, add the pasta, and cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, 8 minutes. Do not drain the pasta water. If needed, add additional water to help the pasta cook.', '4. Stir in the roasted red pepper sauce (you may not need it all), manchego, and basil. Toss until very creamy and heated through. Slide in the chicken and any juices left on the plate.', '5. Serve the pasta topped with fresh manchego and arugula. Enjoy!']

title: Caprese Garlic Bread with Crispy Prosciutto
ingredients: ['prosciutto, torn', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'champagne or apple cider vinegar', 'honey or maple', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chili flakes', 'burrata cheese', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'fresh basil, thinly sliced', 'salted butter', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'chopped fresh parsley', 'ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise', 'garlic, halved']
ingredients with measurement: {'prosciutto, torn': '3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'champagne or apple cider vinegar': '3', 'honey or maple': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'burrata cheese': '8', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '2', 'fresh basil, thinly sliced': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'chopped fresh thyme': '2', 'chopped fresh parsley': '2', 'ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise': '1', 'garlic, halved': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and arrange the prosciutto in an even layer. Transfer to the oven and cook 8-10 minutes, until the prosciutto is crisp.', '2. In a bowl, whisk together the olive oil, vinegar, honey or maple syrup, salt, pepper, and chili flakes. Add the tomatoes and basil, toss with the dressing.', '3. In a bowl, mix the butter, parmesan, thyme, parsley, and a pinch of pepper.', '4. Set your grill to medium-high heat. Rub each half of the bread with olive oil. Grill the bread, cut side down, for 3-5 minutes or until light grill marks appear. Remove and rub each half with 1 garlic clove, then spread the butter onto the grilled bread. Return to the grill and cook, cut side up until warmed, 3-5 minutes.', '5. Break the burrata cheese over the warm grilled bread. Spoon over the tomatoes, top with fresh basil and crumbled prosciutto. Slice and serve!']

title: Pull Apart Italian Sub Sliders
ingredients: ['dinner rolls, halved lengthwise', 'dijon mustard', 'fig preserves', 'roasted red pepper sauce, or 2 roasted red peppers, sliced', 'mixed pitted Italian olives, chopped', 'chopped pepperoncini', 'assorted deli meat', 'fresh basil leaves', 'whole milk deli mozzarella cheese', 'deli provolone cheese', 'baby arugula', 'salted butter, at room temperature', 'garlic, chopped', 'Italian seasoning', 'grated parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'dinner rolls, halved lengthwise': '1', 'dijon mustard': '1/4', 'fig preserves': '1', 'roasted red pepper sauce, or 2 roasted red peppers, sliced': '1/2', 'mixed pitted Italian olives, chopped': '1/2', 'chopped pepperoncini': '2', 'assorted deli meat': '9-12', 'fresh basil leaves': '1/2', 'whole milk deli mozzarella cheese': '4-6', 'deli provolone cheese': '4-6', 'baby arugula': '1', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4-6', 'Italian seasoning': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. Place the bottom half of the dinner rolls\xa0onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Spread the dijon over the bottom half of the roll. Add the fig preserves and red pepper sauce (or red peppers). Layer on the olives,  pepperoncini, deli meats, basil, mozzarella, provolone, and then arugula. Place the top half of the roll over the cheese.', '3. In a bowl, mix together the butter, garlic, Italian seasoning, and parmesan. Spread the butter over the top of the rolls, reserving extra for serving. Cover the rolls with tin foil and bake 10-15 minutes. Remove the foil and continue baking another 10-15 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '4. Brush with any remaining garlic butter, serve immediately with additional red pepper sauce on the side.']

title: Grilled Caprese Pesto Chicken Skewers
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'basil pesto', 'balsamic vinegar', 'honey', 'lemon juice', 'kosher salt, black pepper, and chili flakes', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size chunks', 'cherry tomatoes', 'mozzarella balls', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'fresh basil leaves']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'basil pesto': '2/3', 'balsamic vinegar': '1/3', 'honey': '3', 'lemon juice': '2', 'kosher salt, black pepper, and chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size chunks': '2', 'cherry tomatoes': '2', 'mozzarella balls': '1/2', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8', 'fresh basil leaves': '2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the vinaigrette. In a glass jar, combine the pesto, balsamic vinegar, honey, and lemon. Season with chili flakes, salt, and pepper.', '2. In a bowl, toss the chicken with half of the vinaigrette and 1 tablespoon olive oil. In a separate bowl toss the tomatoes with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper.', '3. Set your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium-high heat. Take skewers and thread the chicken with the tomatoes. If you have additional tomatoes, thread them on additional skewers and grill them up with the chicken.', '4. Grill the skewers until lightly charred and cooked through, turning them occasionally throughout cooking, about 10 to 12 minutes total.', '5. To serve, toss the mozzarella balls with a couple tablespoons of the vinaigrette. Arrange the mozzarella and burrata on a serving plate. Place the skewers over the cheese. Spoon the remaining vinaigrette over everything. I usually add additional olive oil + balsamic too. Top with basil. Enjoy!']

title: Skillet Chicken Fajitas with Creamy Jalapeño Verde Sauce.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless chicken breast or thighs, thinly sliced', 'smoked paprika', 'chili powder or tajin', 'cumin', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili flakes', 'yellow onion, sliced', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'poblano pepper, sliced', 'tortillas, warmed', 'cotija cheese, limes, and cilantro, for serving', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'salsa verde', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'boneless chicken breast or thighs, thinly sliced': '1 1/2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'chili powder or tajin': '2', 'cumin': '2', 'dried oregano': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'yellow onion, sliced': '1', 'bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'poblano pepper, sliced': '1', 'tortillas, warmed': '8-10', 'cotija cheese, limes, and cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '4', 'salsa verde': '3/4', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped': '1-3'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, combine the olive oil, chicken, paprika, chili powder, cumin, oregano, salt, and pepper, toss to coat. Set the skillet over high heat. Cook until seared all over and cooked through, 8-10 minutes. During the last 2 minutes of cooking, add the butter, garlic, and chili flakes. Cook 1 minute, then remove everything from the skillet.', '2. In the same skillet, add the onions and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Toss in the bell peppers and poblano peppers. Season with salt and pepper. Cook until the peppers are tender, another 5 minutes.', '3. Add the chicken to the peppers and toss to combine.', '4. To make the sauce, melt together the cream cheese and salsa verde in a small skillet over low-low heat, whisking constantly until creamy. Remove from the heat and stir in the jalapeños.', '5. Stuff the chicken, peppers, and onions into the warmed tortillas, and top with the verde sauce, cilantro, and cheese. Enjoy!']

title: Skillet Louisiana Style Chicken and Rice
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'cajun seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'lemon, sliced', 'dry broken spaghetti or angel hair pasta', 'long grain rice', 'medium yellow onion, sliced', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh tenders herbs, cilantro + parsley', 'chili flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '1', 'cajun seasoning': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '6', 'lemon, sliced': '1', 'dry broken spaghetti or angel hair pasta': '1/2', 'long grain rice': '1', 'medium yellow onion, sliced': '1', 'bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3-4', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'fresh tenders herbs, cilantro + parsley': '1/2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a large oven-safe skillet, combine the olive oil, chicken, and cajun seasoning, toss to coat. Set the skillet over high heat. Sear on both sides until golden, 3-5 minutes. During the last 2 minutes of cooking, add 1 tablespoon of butter and lemon slices. Remove everything from the skillet.', '3. Add the rice and pasta. Cook until the rice is toasted, about 1 minute. Add the onion and peppers and continue to cook another 3-4 minutes, then pour in 3 cups broth. Season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil.', '4. Slide the chicken, lemon slices, and any juices left on the plate back into the skillet.\xa0Bring to a boil. Cover the skillet and turn the heat down to the lowest setting possible. Allow the rice to cook 10 minutes, until most of the liquid has cooked into the rice, but not all of it. If needed add more broth. Bake, uncovered for 10-15 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '5. Meanwhile, melt together 5 tablespoons butter, the garlic, and a pinch of chili flakes. Cook until the butter is browning. Stir in the mixed herbs.', '6. Serve the chicken and rice drizzled with garlic butter and topped with fresh herbs.']

title: Lemon Pesto Burrata and Brown Butter Gnocchi
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'asparagus, ends trimmed', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili flakes', 'lemon zest', 'fresh potato gnocchi', 'basil pesto', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'fresh parmesan, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'asparagus, ends trimmed': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '6', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'lemon zest': '2', 'fresh potato gnocchi': '1', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8', 'fresh parmesan, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the asparagus and cook until tender, 3-5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Add 1 tablespoon butter, 1 clove garlic, lemon zest, and chili flakes. Cook until the butter browns, 1-2 minutes. Remove from the skillet.', '2. To the same skillet, add the gnocchi and 5 tablespoons butter. Allow the gnocchi to get crispy, about 4-5 minutes, then toss with the butter and add the garlic. Cook another 2 minutes, then stir in the pesto and remove from the heat. Season with salt and pepper.', '3. Break the burrata into serving bowls. Add the asparagus, then spoon over the gnocchi. Top with parmesan and extra pesto.']

title: Jalapeño Cream Cheese Chicken Taquitos with Buffalo Sauce
ingredients: ['cooked shredded chicken', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired, and chopped', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'buffalo sauce', 'shredded pepper jack or cheddar cheese', 'corn tortillas, warmed', 'olive oil, for rubbing', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream', 'buttermilk', 'fresh parsley, chopped', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'cooked shredded chicken': '1 1/2', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '4', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired, and chopped': '1', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped': '2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh dill, chopped': '2', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'buffalo sauce': '1/3', 'shredded pepper jack or cheddar cheese': '1', 'corn tortillas, warmed': '16-20', 'olive oil, for rubbing': 'seasoning', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream': '1/2', 'buttermilk': '1/2', 'fresh parsley, chopped': '1/4', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'kosher salt': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a bowl, combine the chicken, cream cheese, jalapeño, pickled jalapeños, cilantro, dill, and green onions. Stir in the cheese and buffalo sauce.', '3. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds to 1 minute in the microwave, until pliable. On a baking sheet, rub the tortillas with olive oil. title: One Pot Sun-Dried Tomato Pasta with Whipped Ricotta
ingredients: ['oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'small shallots, sliced', 'garlic, chopped', 'spanish or smoked paprika', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'short cut pasta', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'lemon juice', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'salted butter', 'chopped fresh basil', 'chopped fresh parsley', 'chopped fresh dill']
ingredients with measurement: {'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1', 'small shallots, sliced': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'spanish or smoked paprika': '1 1/2', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1', 'lemon juice': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'chopped fresh basil': '1/3', 'chopped fresh parsley': '1/3', 'chopped fresh dill': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Drain the oil from the sun-dried tomato jar into a large pot or skillet with sides. Chop the sun-dried tomatoes.', '2. Set the pot over medium-high heat. Add the shallots and garlic, cook until fragrant, 2 minutes. Stir in the sun-dried tomatoes, paprika, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. title: 20 Minute Red Curry Basil Garlic Oil Noodles

ingredients: ['linguine or fettuccini', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chicken cutlets or 1 pound tenders', 'cajun seasoning', 'parmesan cheese', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'lemon juice', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'heavy cream', 'chopped fresh parsley']
ingredients with measurement: {'linguine or fettuccini': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'chicken cutlets or 1 pound tenders': '6', 'cajun seasoning': '2', 'parmesan cheese': '1 1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '4', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'lemon juice': '2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '1', 'heavy cream': '1', 'chopped fresh parsley': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta al dente, according to package directions. Drain.', '2. In bowl, toss together the olive oil, chicken, cajun seasoning, 2 tablespoons parmesan, and a big pinch of pepper.', '3. Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large pan set over medium-high heat, add the chicken and sear until deeply golden on both sides, 5 minutes per side. Turn the heat off and pour over the lemon juice. Transfer to a plate.', '4. To the same pan, add 2 tablespoons butter, the garlic, and chili flakes. Cook 1 minute, until fragrant, then pour in the broth and milk. Whisk until smooth. Bring the sauce to a gentle simmer and cook 5 minutes, until slightly thickened. Stir in 1 1/2 cups parmesan, then toss in the pasta. Cook 2 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the parsley.', '5. Serve immediately topped with sliced chicken and parsley.']

title: Parchment Baked Roasted Red Pepper Salmon
ingredients: ['roasted red peppers, drained', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'garlic, smashed', 'lemon juice', 'smoked paprika', 'cumin', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'small potatoes, very thinly sliced', 'salmon fillets', 'tzatziki, for serving', 'fresh dill and basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'roasted red peppers, drained': '1', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'honey': '2', 'garlic, smashed': '4', 'lemon juice': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'cumin': '1/2', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'small potatoes, very thinly sliced': '2', 'salmon fillets': '4', 'tzatziki, for serving': 'seasoning', 'fresh dill and basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.\xa0Fold 4 large pieces of parchment paper (about 15×16 inches) in half.', '2. In a blender, combine the red peppers, sun-dried tomatoes, olive oil, honey, garlic, lemon, paprika, cumin, chili flakes, salt, and pepper.', '3. Working on one side of the creased parchment, layer the potatoes, and season with salt and pepper. Place the salmon over the potatoes and spoon over 1-2 spoonfuls of the red pepper sauce. Repeat with the remaining ingredients to make 4 packets.', '4. To close, fold the parchment over salmon, pinching to seal the open sides and create a half-moon-shaped packet. Place on a rimmed baking sheet. Bake on the bottom rack until the potatoes are tender, about 15-20 minutes.', '5. Serve the salmon topped with tzatziki and fresh herbs.']

title: Spicy Orange Sesame Chicken
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes', 'egg white', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'orange zest', 'black pepper', 'cornstarch', 'avocado oil', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'fresh orange juice + 2 tablespoons zest', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'honey', 'garlic, grated', 'fresh grated ginger', 'chili flakes', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'green onions and sesame seeds, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes': '1 1/2', 'egg white': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'orange zest': '1', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'cornstarch': '1/3', 'avocado oil': '1/3', 'low sodium chicken broth': '1/3', 'fresh orange juice + 2 tablespoons zest': '1', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'honey': '3', 'garlic, grated': '4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'chili flakes': '1/2-1', 'toasted sesame seeds': '2', 'green onions and sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the chicken, egg white, tamari/soy sauce, orange zest, and pepper. Toss well to coat. In a separate bowl, add the cornstarch.', '2. Dredge the chicken through the cornstarch to coat.', '3. In a glass jar, whisk together the broth, orange juice, tamari/soy sauce, rice vinegar, and honey.', '4. Heat the avocado oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken, working in batches, cook until golden all around, about 5 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet.', '5. To the skillet, add the garlic, ginger, and chili flakes. Cook 1-2 minutes. Pour in the orange sauce. Bring to a boil, boil 3-4 minutes, then add the chicken. Toss with the sauce and cook until the sauce thickens around the chicken, about 5 minutes.', '6. Serve the chicken and sauce over steamed rice with sesame seeds and green onions.']

title: Crockpot Crispy Chicken Tinga Tacos with Jalapeño Avocado Crema
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'red enchilada sauce', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped', 'dried oregano', 'ground cumin', 'kosher salt', 'corn tortillas, warmed', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'shredded lettuce and pickled onions, for serving', 'large avocados, halved', 'pickled jalapeños', 'fresh cilantro', 'honey', 'garlic, grated', 'limes (juice from)', 'flaky salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '1 1/2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'red enchilada sauce': '3/4', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped': '2-3', 'dried oregano': '1', 'ground cumin': '1', 'kosher salt': '1', 'corn tortillas, warmed': '12-16', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1/2', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'shredded lettuce and pickled onions, for serving': 'seasoning', 'large avocados, halved': '2', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/4-1/2', 'fresh cilantro': '1/2', 'honey': '1-2', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'limes (juice from)': '2', 'flaky salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the chicken, onion, enchilada sauce, chipotle, oregano, cumin, and salt. Cover and cook on LOW for 4-5 hours or on HIGH for 2-3 hours.', '2. When finished cooking, shred the meat and toss with the sauce. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '3. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds to 1 minute in the microwave, until pliable. On a baking sheet, rub the tortillas with olive oil. Lay each tortilla flat and then layer evenly with cheese and chicken. Fold the other half of the tortilla over the filling, gently pushing to adhere (see above photo). Transfer to the oven and bake for 5-8 minutes, then flip and cook another 5 minutes, or until the cheese has melted and the tortillas are crisp.', '4. Meanwhile, make the Avocado Crema. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt.', '5. Serve the tacos topped with avocado, lettuce, limes, and any other desired toppings.']

title: Sheet Pan Greek Garlic Butter Chicken and Potatoes
ingredients: ['baby potatoes, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'lemons, 1 halved, and 1 sliced', 'chicken thighs or breasts', 'dried oregano', 'smoked or regular paprika', 'shallot, chopped', 'red pepper flakes', 'garlic cloves, lightly smashed', 'mixed fresh parsley, oregano, and dill, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'yellow onion, sliced', 'feta cheese, cubed', 'salted butter, sliced into 6 pieces', 'red wine vinegar', 'pepperoncini, chopped', 'Greek olive mix, or green olives, torn']
ingredients with measurement: {'baby potatoes, halved': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'lemons, 1 halved, and 1 sliced': '2', 'chicken thighs or breasts': '6', 'dried oregano': '2', 'smoked or regular paprika': '1', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'garlic cloves, lightly smashed': '6-8', 'mixed fresh parsley, oregano, and dill, chopped': '2', 'yellow onion, sliced': '1', 'feta cheese, cubed': '6-8', 'salted butter, sliced into 6 pieces': '4', 'red wine vinegar': '2', 'pepperoncini, chopped': '1-2', 'Greek olive mix, or green olives, torn': '3/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F.', '2. On a large baking sheet, toss the potatoes with 2 tablespoons olive oil. Season with salt and black pepper. Add the lemon halves. Roast for 20 minutes, or until tender.', '3. In a bowl, toss together 2 tablespoons olive oil, the chicken, dried oregano, paprika, shallot, salt, pepper, and chili flakes.', '4. Remove the potatoes from the oven and nestle the chicken around the potatoes.\xa0Arrange the onions, garlic, and lemon slices around the chicken. Add 1 slice of butter to each piece of chicken. Return the pan to the oven for 20-25 minutes more, until the chicken is cooked through.', '5. To make the dressing. Combine the remaining 1/3 cup olive oil, red wine vinegar, herbs, pepperoncinis, and olives.', '6. Remove the charred lemon slices and garlic cloves from the baking sheet. Finely chop the lemon slices, rind and all, discarding any seeds. Add half of the lemon to the dressing. Chop/mash the garlic into a paste, stir the garlic into the dressing. Season with red pepper and salt. Taste adding more of the lemon as desired.', '7. Break the feta over the chicken, then add the dressing. Top with fresh herbs. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Red’s Favorite Spicy Tuna Poke Bowl
ingredients: ['sushi grade tuna steaks, cubed', 'soy sauce or tamari', 'sesame chili oil', 'grated ginger', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'chopped green onions', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'Persian cucumbers, sliced', 'rice vinegar', 'honey', 'sushi rice, cooked', 'avocado, pickled ginger, and nori sheets – for serving', 'fried shallot crumbs', 'olive oil mayo', 'sriracha', 'soy sauce or tamari', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'sushi grade tuna steaks, cubed': '2', 'soy sauce or tamari': '2', 'sesame chili oil': '1', 'grated ginger': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1 to 2', 'chopped green onions': '1/4', 'toasted sesame seeds': '1', 'Persian cucumbers, sliced': '1', 'rice vinegar': '1', 'honey': '1', 'sushi rice, cooked': '3-4', 'avocado, pickled ginger, and nori sheets – for serving': 'seasoning', 'fried shallot crumbs': 'seasoning', 'olive oil mayo': '1/3', 'sriracha': '1 to 2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the poke. In a medium bowl, combine the tuna, soy sauce (or tamari), sesame chili oil, ginger, red pepper flakes, green onion, and sesame seeds. Toss to mix.', '2. To make the cucumber salad. Toss together the cucumbers, rice vinegar, honey, and a pinch each of chili flakes and salt.', '3. To make the Spicy Mayo. In a small bowl, stir together the mayo, sriracha, honey, and soy sauce (or tamari).', '4. To assemble, add the rice to bowls, top with avocado, cucumber salad, poke, pickled ginger, green onions, and nori. Spoon over the spicy mayo. Sprinkle on the crumbs. Serve with additional spicy mayo.']

title: Sheet Pan Chicken Gyros with Feta Tzatziki.
ingredients: ['full-fat plain Greek yogurt', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed', 'fresh lemon juice', 'garlic cloves, chopped', 'shallots, chopped', 'smoked paprika', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'red pepper flakes', 'Kosher salt and black pepper', 'fresh pitas or naan warmed,', 'pickled red onion, lettuce, dill, and parsley for serving', 'feta cheese', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'garlic grated', 'juice from 1 lemon', 'Persian cucumbers, shredded', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'full-fat plain Greek yogurt': '1/3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed': '1 1/2', 'fresh lemon juice': '1/4', 'garlic cloves, chopped': '6', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'Kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh pitas or naan warmed,': '6', 'pickled red onion, lettuce, dill, and parsley for serving': 'seasoning', 'feta cheese': '8', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'garlic grated': '2', 'juice from 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'Persian cucumbers, shredded': '1-2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the yogurt, olive oil, cubed chicken, lemon juice, garlic, shallots, paprika, oregano, chili flakes, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Let marinate for 15 minutes at room temperature or up to overnight in the refrigerator.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Arrange the chicken on a baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes, toss and bake another 5-10 minutes, or until cooked through. Switch the oven to broil. Broil 1-2 minutes, until the chicken chars on the edges (watch carefully)', '3. Meanwhile, make the Tzatziki. Combine the feta, 1/4 cup yogurt, garlic, and lemon juice in a blender and blend until creamy. Stir in 1/3 cup more yogurt, the cucumbers, and a pinch of salt and red pepper flakes.', '4. To assemble, stuff/spread each pita with tzatziki, then lettuce, and chicken. Add red onions and herbs. Drizzle over more tzatziki and if desired, harissa (recipe in notes).']

title: Crispy Sesame Garlic Chili Oil Noodles
ingredients: ['sesame or peanut oil', 'garlic, finely chopped', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'bay leaf', 'sesame seeds', 'ginger, grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes, to taste', 'Korean chili flakes (Gochugaru)', 'paprika', 'cayenne pepper, to taste', 'rice noodles', 'bell peppers, thinly sliced', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'chopped fresh cilantro', 'chopped fresh Thai or regular basil', 'chopped fresh green onions']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame or peanut oil': '3/4', 'garlic, finely chopped': '1', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'bay leaf': '1', 'sesame seeds': '3', 'ginger, grated': '3', 'crushed red pepper flakes, to taste': '1-3', 'Korean chili flakes (Gochugaru)': '1', 'paprika': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper, to taste': '1/4-1/2', 'rice noodles': '8', 'bell peppers, thinly sliced': '2', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'chopped fresh cilantro': '1/3', 'chopped fresh Thai or regular basil': '1/4', 'chopped fresh green onions': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. In a medium skillet, combine the sesame oil, garlic, shallots, and bay leaf. Cook over medium heat until the garlic turns golden and is crisping, about 5-8 minutes. Stir in the sesame seeds and ginger, cook 1 minute.', '2. Pour the oil into a large bowl. Add the chili flakes, paprika, cayenne, and season with salt. I use all of the oil for the noodles, but if desired, reserve half of the oil for serving.', '3. Cook the noodles according to package directions. During the last 3 minutes, add the bell peppers to the water. Save 1/4 cup water, then drain. Toss the hot noodles, tamari/soy sauce, and all of the herbs with the chili oil, add water to thin to reach desired consistency.', '4. Serve the noodles with additional chili oil and green onions.']

title: Creamy White Bean Lemon Pesto Orzo Soup
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, smashed', 'red pepper flakes', 'salted butter', 'dry orzo pasta', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'white beans', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'kale, finely shredded', 'basil pesto', 'whole milk or canned full fat coconut milk', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, smashed': '4-6', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'dry orzo pasta': '2', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '6', 'white beans': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'kale, finely shredded': '1/2', 'basil pesto': '1/2', 'whole milk or canned full fat coconut milk': '1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add the shallot, garlic, and chili flakes and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes.\xa0Drop in the butter, then stir in the orzo. Cook until golden, 1-3 minutes. Pour in the broth and bring to a boil over high heat. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in the beans and kale. Season with salt and pepper. If you have one, add a parmesan rind. Simmer 8-10 minutes until the orzo is al dente, stirring often. It should become very creamy.', '2. Stir in the pesto, milk, parmesan, and lemon, cook another few minutes until warmed through.', '3. Divide the orzo and broth among bowls and add additional parmesan and black pepper. I like to add some fresh dill, parsley, or basil too!']

title: Baked Sesame Orange Cauliflower
ingredients: ['cauliflower, cut into florets', 'eggs, beaten', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'cornstarch', 'sesame oil', 'garlic, grated', 'fresh grated ginger', 'chili flakes', 'fresh orange juice + 1 tablespoon orange zest', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'honey', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'green onions, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'eggs, beaten': '3', 'Panko bread crumbs': '1 1/4', 'cornstarch': '2', 'sesame oil': '1', 'garlic, grated': '4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'chili flakes': '1/2-1', 'fresh orange juice + 1 tablespoon orange zest': '1', 'tamari/soy sauce': '1/3', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'honey': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': '2', 'green onions, for serving': 'seasoning'}

title: Crispy Cheese Poblano Avocado Burrito
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'russet potato, chopped', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chipotle chili powder', 'chili powder', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped', 'black beans, drained', 'avocado, smashed', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'tomato salsa', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend', 'jalapenos, sliced', 'large tortillas', 'plain greek yogurt or sour cream', 'garlic, grated', 'juice of 1-2 limes']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'russet potato, chopped': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '1', 'chili powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped': '2', 'black beans, drained': '1', 'avocado, smashed': '1', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1/2-1', 'tomato salsa': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend': '3', 'jalapenos, sliced': '1-2', 'large tortillas': '6', 'plain greek yogurt or sour cream': '1/2', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'juice of 1-2 limes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. Add the potato and onion, cook 5 minutes un softened. Add the chipotle chili powder, chili powder, garlic powder, and salt. Stir in the poblanos, cook another 5 minutes, then remove from the heat and stir in the beans.', '2. To make the burritos.\xa0Place one tortilla at a time in the microwave for 20 seconds. Layer the avocado, pepper jack, peppers/beans, salsa, and cilantro. Fold the tortilla over the ingredients. Fold sides and ends of tortillas over filling and roll forward. Repeat with remaining tortillas and ingredients.', '3. To make the crema. Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Season with salt.', '4. Heat a skillet over medium heat. Arrange 2-3 jalapeño slices in a line in the skillet. Sprinkle over 1/2 cup cheese in 4-6 inch circle/square. Place the burrito on top of the cheese. Cook 3-5 minutes. When the cheese starts to crisp on the bottom, use a spatula to gently wrap the burrito up in the cheese. Continue to cook 3-4 minutes, until crisped all over.', '5. Serve warm with lime crema and any amount of desired toppings, whatever you love!']

title: Oven Fried Southern Hot Honey Popcorn Chicken
ingredients: ['egg', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes', 'corn flakes – finely crushed, or use Panko', 'flour', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'honey', 'cayenne pepper, to taste', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'onion powder', 'chili flakes, to taste']
ingredients with measurement: {'egg': '1', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes': '2', 'corn flakes – finely crushed, or use Panko': '1 1/4', 'flour': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '6', 'garlic, chopped': '4-6', 'honey': '3', 'cayenne pepper, to taste': '1-2', 'chili powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'chili flakes, to taste': '1/2'}

title: One Pot Stove-Top Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['short-cut pasta', 'broccoli, chopped', 'canned coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk', 'cream cheese, cubed', 'medium zucchini, grated', 'dijon mustard', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded monterey jack cheese', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'salted butter', 'Kosher salt and black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'short-cut pasta': '1', 'broccoli, chopped': '1', 'canned coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk': '3/4', 'cream cheese, cubed': '3', 'medium zucchini, grated': '1', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '2', 'shredded monterey jack cheese': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'salted butter': '1-2', 'Kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning'}

title: One Skillet White Chicken Chili Bake.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped', 'red bell pepper, seeded and chopped', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired, and chopped', 'ground cumin', 'smoked paprika', 'chili powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'long grain rice', 'salsa verde', 'white beans, drained', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'avocado and green onions, for serving', 'lime zest and juice, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped': '2', 'red bell pepper, seeded and chopped': '1', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired, and chopped': '1', 'ground cumin': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chili powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'long grain rice': '1', 'salsa verde': '2 1/2', 'white beans, drained': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '3/4', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1/2', 'avocado and green onions, for serving': 'seasoning', 'lime zest and juice, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a large oven safe skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and chicken and cook 5 minutes.
